description: Primes p such that the following primes are p + 42 and p + 84.
comments: Old name was: Primes p(k) such that p(k+2)-p(k+1)=p(k+1)-p(k)=42.
links: Zak Seidov, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..2000
prog: (PARI) is_A052198(n)=nextprime(n+1)==n+42 && nextprime(n+43)==n+84 && isprime(n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 07 2013, typo corrected by _M. F. Hasler_, Jan 13 2013
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jan 28 2000
extensions: New name by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 07 2013
